Style/InvertibleUnlessCondition.description:
Description

Favor `if` with inverted condition over `unless`.
Style/InvertibleUnlessCondition.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

InverseMethods: {':!=': ':==', ':>': ':<=', ':<=': ':>', ':<': ':>=', ':>=': ':<', ':!~': ':=~', ':zero?': ':nonzero?', ':nonzero?': ':zero?', ':any?': ':none?', ':none?': ':any?', ':even?': ':odd?', ':odd?': ':even?'} (type: dict)
